user.title: Set up Stokercloud
user.description: Enter your Stokercloud username. You can find it in your Stokercloud URL: https://stokercloud.dk/v3/#/USERNAME/main-page

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Stokercloud API. Please check your username and internet connection.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Stokercloud account is already configured.

init.title: Configure Stokercloud Options
init.description: Adjust settings for your Stokercloud integration.
